text: The Black Carpet was a show that aired on BET. It presented news and gossip about African-American celebrities. BET aired the show weekly after its original premiere on July 13, 2006, when it replaced BET Style.What's On Tonight - The New York Times The show's hosts were Touré and Danella. Touré confirmed that the show was cancelled in late 2008. The last episode was aired on December 24, 2008. == References == * THE BLACK CARPET at bet.mediaroom.com Category:BET original programming Category:2006 American television series debuts Category:2008 American television series endings
title: The Black Carpet
